input: Saving Private Ryan is a movie directed by Steven Spielberg, set during the invasion of Normandy in World War II. It follows a group of US Army Rangers who are sent behind enemy lines to find and bring back the titular missing soldier.
output: Saving Private Ryan follows a group of US Army Rangers as they go behind enemy lines to rescue one missing soldier during the invasion of Normandy in World War II. Directed by Steven Spielberg, the movie provides an intense and gritty look at the horrors of battle, as well as a tale of redemption and courage in the face of adversity.
